name: Anti-Psychic Countermeasures
description: Strategies to detect, block, and reverse psychic intrusions and mind-control attempts.

cards.title: Identifying Psychic Threats
cards.description: Training in recognizing and neutralizing external psychic influences.
cards.bulletpoints: Threat Detection, Energy Disruption, Mind Signature Analysis

cards.title: Defensive Combat Against Psychic Manipulation
cards.description: Using counter-strategies to resist and repel mental manipulation.
cards.bulletpoints: Psychic Reflection, Energy Mirror Techniques, Thought Recalibration
